desc.p: Holds the amount utilised from the exposure limit on the corresponding phased reduction date. This field is updated when there is a drawing amount within the exposure limit
The phased redution amount of the Facility on the date given at the EXP.DATE field is updated here. This field is updated based on the vaule from the field DEC.AMOUNT in FACILITY
Holds the exposure amount after every reduction which is available for drawing
Holds the exposure date based on the phased reduction in a revolving type Facility. This is a multivalue field associated with EXP.AMOUNT, DECREASE.AMT and UTIL.AMOUNT fields
